name: Youda Safari
summary:
“Live a wild dream!” 
 
Give tourists a once in a lifetime holiday experience as you guide them past rebellious rhinos, hilarious hippos and much other wildlife in your own safari park! 
 
Groups of enthusiastic and eager safari tourists depend on you to show them the most exotic animals in their natural habitat when they book a safari. 
 
Choose the best Kodak moments, track down shy animals and upgrade your park with new vehicles, larger facilities, restaurants and extended services. 
 
Experience the beauty of wildlife when you go on one adventure after the other.
